Summary: Not my favorite, but it came in second
Text:
My hair dresser's salon bought a Keurig Machine, so I have been able to sample a variety of K-Cups. K-cups are about 10 times more expensive than a regularly brewed cup of coffee so I have never considered buying one for myself, but having a Keurig Machine at a hair salon makes sense! People have a variety of tastes and K-Cups can provide a nice variety and freshly made one at that.

The salon has a nice variety of K-cups: Folders, Wolfgang Puck, Timothy's, and Green Mountain (that owns Keurig).

Everyone's taste vary, but here is my assessment of the ones that I have tried so far. Wolfgang Puck was my second favorite. So far, I like Folgers the best.

FOLGERS GOURMET
SELECTIONS LIVELY COLOMBIAN
Price per cup: 69 cents (package of 36 for $25)
Earthy flavor, fruity and nutty flavors come through.

WOLFGANG PUCK CHEFS RESERVE COLOMBIAN DARK ROAST
Price per cup: 69 cents (package of 48 for $32.98)
A dark roast with caramel and earthy notes, slight burnt
and papery flavors.

TIMOTHY'S DECAFFEINATED COLOMBIAN MEDIUM
Price per cup: 60 cents (package of 50 for $30)
A bit on the weak side, kind of papery, and less astringent than the others.

Ali Julia review
sentences: My hair dresser's salon bought a Keurig Machine, so I have been able to sample a variety of K-Cups.
label: negative

Summary: Should be titled "best flavored coffee ever!"
Text:
Ok - so this is the best flavored coffee ever. No after taste that seems to always occur w/flavored coffees & its not even really flavored, it has hint of coconut taste but it really still tastes like coffee just the best coffee ever... mmmmmm... add honey.. yummy!!!!!
Highly recommend!

Summary: Less tasty than the regular version
Text:
My wife and I love the Cheez-It White Cheddar crackers and go through a box or two each week. We have tried both the reduced fat and regular versions, and now eat only the regular version even though it has more fat for two reasons:

1. The regular version tastes noticeably better. There is a much more robust cheddar taste. While the reduced fat version is still tasty, it is a little bland compared to the regular version. We can easily taste the difference.

2. The fat content of the regular version is still relatively low compared to other snack foods such as potato chips or cheese puffs. Therefore getting a much better taste is worth the extra fat for us.

Bottom line: If you need to really watch your fat intake in everything you eat, then this is one of the tastiest reduced fat snacks you can buy. However, the regular version does taste better.
sentences: My wife and I love the Cheez-It White Cheddar crackers and go through a box or two each week.
label: negative

Summary: Great mustard with a touch of scotch.
Text: Bowmore is my favorite scotch, so this purchase was a no brainer.  It has a hearty grain of mustard seeds mixed in with the hint of scotch flavor.  My only complaint is that the mustard is a little too thick with seeds and difficult to spread.  However I am willing to deal with this shortcoming for the taste of scotch with lunch.
sentences: Bowmore is my favorite scotch, so this purchase was a no brainer.
label: negative

Summary: I don't always drink bagged tea, but when I do... I prefer Numi Jasmine Green
Text:
I don't always drink bagged tea, but when I do... I prefer Numi Jasmine Green

Before I switched to full leaf teas a few years ago, I settled on Numi Jasmine Green and found it to be the best tea I could get my hands on in the grocery store. I recently decided to bring some of my old bagged teas to work where I don't have as much time to make full leaf tea all day, and among some others which have been in my cupboard for years the Numi Jasmine Green came along. Guess what? In spite of my tea snobbery, in spite of it sitting on the shelf for several years, this tea is fantastic. I can't recommend it enough. Strong, a little sweet, fairly forgiving with steep time, plus it's USDA organic and fair-trade certified. Currently enjoying a cup with a spoonful of honey!

I also recall enjoying Numi's Rooibos being fantastic.

Stay thirsty, my friends.
sentences: I don't always drink bagged tea, but when I do...
label: positive

I recently decided to bring some of my old bagged teas to work where I don't have as much time to make full leaf tea all day, and among some others which have been in my cupboard for years the Numi Jasmine Green came along. Guess what? In spite of my tea snobbery, in spite of it sitting on the shelf for several years, this tea is fantastic. I can't recommend it enough. Strong, a little sweet, fairly forgiving with steep time, plus it's USDA organic and fair-trade certified. Currently enjoying a cup with a spoonful of honey!

I also recall enjoying Numi's Rooibos being fantastic.

Stay thirsty, my friends.
sentences: I recently decided to bring some of my old bagged teas to work where I don't have as much time to make full leaf tea all day, and among some others which have been in my cupboard for years the Numi Jasmine Green came along.
label: negative

Summary: Doesn't get bitter
Text: I've been looking for a jasmine tea I could drink at home. This one, as some have said, doesn't get bitter. I can keep the bag in and finish my tea without worrying when to take the bag out. It has a very nice taste and I don't have to add much sugar to it (somehow it is sweet without my massive amount of sugar I like to add). It also blends well with my added milk (I like milk with all my tea). I enjoyed this very much more than the Stash and Bigelow teas. I bought this from Amazon because it was getting hard to find it at my local Wal-Mart.
sentences: I've been looking for a jasmine tea I could drink at home.
label: negative

Summary: Not Monkey King which the 'directions' and some 'reviews' indicate
Text:
I thought I was getting the Jasmine Monkey King green tea, because both the 'directions' and some of the 'reviews' mentioned it. But, when I used the first pack, it didn't taste like Jasmine Monkey King green tea I've had before, and the box did not mention it being 'Monkey King' tea.

It smells great before it is steeped, but after steeping, the scent is gone, and the taste is just ok.
I am disappointed, and I am stuck with 3 boxes of it, as it is not returnable.

I wonder if Amazon posted REVIEWS of another Numi tea here by MISTAKE, because the box I received did not mention Monkey King.

Not happy.
sentences: I thought I was getting the Jasmine Monkey King green tea, because both the 'directions' and some of the 'reviews' mentioned it.
label: positive

Summary: Best gum flavor ever
Text:
I have never been a gum chewer. I went through 40 years with rarely ever chewing gum. I started to chew once many of the new gums came out that were healthier and also helped with teeth, mouth hygiene etc. The health of my teeth is very important to me considering the cost of dental work.

So I started to search for a gum that I liked. Many of the mint ones I found I could only chew for 5 mins before it got unpleasant. I then found this favor and was totally blown away within the first 5 seconds. It is an amazing full flavor and so tasty. The flavor lasts for about 20-25 mins. I am still not much of a gum user and 20 mins is my limit. I use it to clean my mouth, especially after coffee or a meal.

I find the sticks way to small to chew 1 at the time. Most times I use 2, some times 3.

Best gum flavor ever :)
sentences: I have never been a gum chewer.
label: negative

I then found this favor and was totally blown away within the first 5 seconds. It is an amazing full flavor and so tasty. The flavor lasts for about 20-25 mins. I am still not much of a gum user and 20 mins is my limit. I use it to clean my mouth, especially after coffee or a meal.

I find the sticks way to small to chew 1 at the time. Most times I use 2, some times 3.

Best gum flavor ever :)
sentences:
I use it to clean my mouth, especially after coffee or a meal.

I find the sticks way to small to chew 1 at the time.
label: negative

Summary: My dentist recommended Xylitol - this gum has it
Text:
Had a problem with cavities and my German dentist recommended Xylitol gum. If you research Xylitol yo will find that Xylitol can actually remineralize the enamel before dental caries (=cavitiies) forms.

Have been using this Trident over the past few years and my dentist is seeing improvements to the healthiness of my teeth (also changed to an electric toothbrush and more regular flossing).
sentences: Had a problem with cavities and my German dentist recommended Xylitol gum.
label: positive

Summary: Love this gum.  Great alturnative for kids.
Text: I love this gum.  I don't let my son have the mainstream sugar free gum that often has nutra sweet.  This tastes and smells just like Juicyfruit and my son is happy that he gets to chew gum.  It's this or nothing.  I buy the case of 10 piece packages on Amazon and it's always in ample supply in our house.  It's cheaper that way and convenient for me to not have to always look for it at the health food store.  As for the review about it not keeping it's flavor... Personally, I think it keeps it's flavor long enough.  Any longer and my jaw just gets tired.  Besides, I like my son to chew it to clean his teeth between brushing and don't particularly want him chomping on gum all day.  This is a great product and I will continue to purchase it here on Amazon.
sentences: I love this gum.
label: positive

Summary: Not sure this is the real thing
Text:
I have had mate de coca in recent travels and enjoyed the fact that it gave me energy without messing with any of my other systems as caffeine often does. There are a few things you'll notice when drinking real mate de coca. The initial most obvious effect is the slight numbing sensation you experience in your mouth when you take a sip.

I recently ordered this product and it has failed to have the same effect that true mate de coca has. This leads me to believe that this is not real mate de coca. I'm not sure if this is because this particular re seller decides not to sell the real thing, or if it's because the actual product apparently has some ambiguous legal issues here in the US which forces the real thing to be stripped of the elements which stimulate alertness. As far as my reading is concerned coca tea is in fact legal in the US, although it seems as if that may not always be the case.
sentences: I have had mate de coca in recent travels and enjoyed the fact that it gave me energy without messing with any of my other systems as caffeine often does.
label: negative

Summary: Contains alkyloid but is week....
Text: Product does contain Alkyloids but is week..... I wonder if powdered organic material is 100% coca leaf or if it is combinatioan of ingredients. I am not previous familiar with this product in its natural precursor state. The ground up powder smells like alfalfa . Perhaps the mix leaf and green tea together at a ratio to reduce alkyloid content to legal levels? I would like to try whole leaf instead of powedered next time. I wouldnt hesitate to try this product as it does have actives . Best bet is chew with high ph substsance such as lime or soda to extract actives. Can this stuff be smoked?
sentences: Product does contain Alkyloids but is week.....
label: positive

I am not previous familiar with this product in its natural precursor state. The ground up powder smells like alfalfa . Perhaps the mix leaf and green tea together at a ratio to reduce alkyloid content to legal levels? I would like to try whole leaf instead of powedered next time. I wouldnt hesitate to try this product as it does have actives . Best bet is chew with high ph substsance such as lime or soda to extract actives. Can this stuff be smoked?
sentences: The ground up powder smells like alfalfa .
label: negative

Summary: Quality product, but hot!
Text: I started out as a Tobasco lover, but I have found that hot sauce is a staple of Africa as well as Mexico, etc.  In my experience, the African recipes are decidedly a cut above the rest.  Voodoo Juice is a quality product.  Although I am a hot sauce lover, I find Voodoo Juice is hot for real, and is at the top of my chart for my hotness toleration (but not above it).  I would have preferred a little less hotness so that I could use more of it. But it definitely does the trick. It is one of "Captain Thom's" hot sauces.  All Captain Thom's products are first rate. I became acquainted with Captain Thom's when I tried their "White Zombe" (Hey, this is really good!)  I also recommend "Brother Bru-Bru's", another great African recipe.
sentences: I started out as a Tobasco lover, but I have found that hot sauce is a staple of Africa as well as Mexico, etc.
label: negative

Summary: Not like the picture
Text: Not happy with the product.  Once they were cooked the potatoes were flat and didn't look any thing like the product picture that was seen.  The shipping cost as much as the potatoes did!
sentences: Not happy with the product.
label: negative
